duties_responsibilities.duty: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather essential product details.
Facilitate the creation of Global Trade Item Numbers (GTIN) and barcodes for new products.
Manage the distribution of enriched product information across various platforms.
Assist in the coordination of product sample submissions to relevant stakeholders.
Collaborate with customer support and sales teams to facilitate onboarding of new products.
Conduct regular audits of product information to identify and rectify discrepancies.
Stay informed about industry standards, regulations, and guidelines related to product information.
Suggest and implement process improvements to enhance product information management.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, Supply Chain Management, or related field
